page.title: 07Shiskine Golf & Tennis Club
page.content: There is a golf course at Blackwat- erfoot beside the beach and lots of people go there including locals. Beside the little putting green there is a clubhouse where there is a sports shop and tea-room. The golf course is one of the few courses in the country with twelve holes. Day tickets cost Â£2.25, junior subscription Â£12 pa and senior Â£34.There are about 280 members Beside the golf course there is a bowling green which was built in 1981. It has an all-weather surface and five rinks. It costs 50p for as long as you want. You can either take your own bowls or you can borrow some from the shed there. Beside the bowling green there are two tennis courts made of blaize. The price is Â£1 for half an hour. There is a windshelter between the tennis courts and the bowling green too.
